content: Give me a list of 20 words that end with 'ing'.

Certainly! Here's a list of 20 words that end with "ing":

1. Running
2. Swimming
3. Dancing
4. Singing
5. Writing
6. Reading
7. Cooking
8. Painting
9. Hiking
10. Cycling
11. Fishing
12. Shopping
13. Laughing
14. Thinking
15. Sleeping
16. Dreaming
17. Learning
18. Teaching
19. Traveling
20. Exploring

I hope this helps! If you need more words or have any other questions, feel free to ask.
